thread.title: Greg Kocsis joins Six Senses Zighy Bay as resort manager
thread.title_full: Greg Kocsis joins Six Senses Zighy Bay as resort manager

author: Musandam, July 15, 2015
title: Greg Kocsis joins Six Senses Zighy Bay as resort manager
text:
Greg Kocsis joins Six Senses Zighy Bay as resort manager Musandam, July 15, 2015 
SIX Senses Zighy Bay, located on the northern Musandam Peninsula in Oman, has appointed Greg Kocsis as resort manager. In his new role, he will oversee the resortâ€™s daily operations and development. 

Prior to his appointment, Kocsis, a Hungarian, held the position of executive assistant manager of Taj Exotica Resort and Spa. He started his career as restaurant manager at the Four Seasons hotel in Newport Beach, California. 

He has over 15 years of experience in the hospitality industry having worked with Four Seasons in Los Angeles, Budapest, Damascus and Beirut.
